content: This puts the company in the strong place with total Bylvay patients increasing a strong third quarter sales, solid cash position, two successful Phase 3 studies in PFIC and Alagille syndrome and another ongoing Phase 3 in biliary atresia now fully enrolled, continue to be on a steady pace to drive our aspiration of making Bylvay a billion dollar drug in the second half of the decade, key for us to take Bylvay from a PFIC medicine to a leading pediatric cholestatic liver disease drug.
